meanings.definition: A person who uses a horsewhip.
meanings.sent1: The horsewhipper gently guided the horses with his tool.
meanings.sent2: The horsewhipper was skilled at handling the whip.
meanings.sent3: The horsewhipper entertained the children by cracking the whip in the air.
meanings.sent4: The horsewhipper's authority in the stable was as sharp as his whip.
meanings.sent5: The horsewhipper's presence was always felt among the horses.

meanings.sent1: She decided to horsewhipper the rug to get rid of the dust.
meanings.sent2: He horsewhippered the ground to scare away the pests.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to horsewhipper the cream to make it fluffy for the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The wind seemed to horsewhipper the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent5: The waves horsewhippered the shore relentlessly during the storm.
